item.title: About
item.description: Iter8 enables statistically robust continuous experimentation of microservices in your CI/CD pipelines. Use iter8’s to safely expose competing versions of a microservice within your distributed cloud application to application traffic, gather in-depth insights about key performance and business metrics associated with these versions, and intelligently rollout the best version of your service using an iter8 experiment. Iter8 supports an expressive model of cloud experimentation for a variety of CI/CD scenarios. With iter8, you can:
